title: WONDERSHARE DVD CREATOR AND ACTIVATOR 2.6.532 {2bUnique}}
description:
Whatever's on Your Computer, Watch it Now on DVD.

Want to make your own movies just burn your film collection from your computer to a DVD? Wondershare DVD Creator does it all! Simply drag your favorite videos into the DVD creator to adjust the quality and click burn. The DVD Creator's powerful built-in editor also comes in handy to to combine your own photos, videos and music into a slideshow.There's nothing you can't do with the DVD Creator.
Burn Videos, Photos and Audio of Any Format

Burn popular standard definition video to DVD formats such as AVI, MP4, MPG, MPEG, 3GP, WMV, ASF, RM, RMVB, DAT, MOV and etc.
Burn HD video like MTS, M2TS(AVCHD H.264), TS(MPEG-2), HD MKV(H.264, MPEG-2 HD), HD WMV(VC-1), HD MOV(H.264, MPEG-4) and etc.
Create a memorable photo slideshows onto a DVD by combining your BMP, JPEG, PNG, TIFF or GIF files and videos.

Craft or Touch up Your Videos with the Built-in Editor

Rotate, crop and trim video files to remove letterbox or capture your favorite clips. New
Adjust the level of brightness, contrast, saturation and other special effects for a better visual experience. New
Add image and text watermarks to videos to identify each film as yours. New
Rotate photos, add text transition effects and insert background music for a better photo slideshow.

Customize Your DVD with the Free DVD Menu or Templates

There's up to 40 free static and dynamic DVD menu or templates to choose from.
Customize the thumbnails, buttons, frames and text of your DVD's menu. New
Personalize your DVD's menu with a background image or favorite song.
Preview and Burn Your DVDs with Top Speed

Preview your DVD project before you burn it ensure everything is how you'll like it to be.
Choose from 3 output formats: DVD disc, DVD folder or ISO files to burn.
Supports all popular recordable disc types: DVDÃ¢â‚¬â€œ5 and DVDÃ¢â‚¬â€œ9; DVD-R, DVD+R, DVD-RW, DVD+RW, DVD+R DL, DVD-R DL and DVD-RAM.
